channel.title: Whilst I was playing MoparScape, I discovered a Glitch
channel.description: One of the more, well... odd ones. Look at where I am standing, ::noclip was NOT enabled [img]http://img427.imageshack.us/img427/4759/ontopka7.png[/img] Yes... I am standing on TOP of the Cellar

item.title: Whilst I was playing MoparScape, I discovered a Glitch
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

[quote=“jonyo, post:2, topic:21216”]oh cool… gotta find something usefull for it though lol

plus its not bigger than killing hundreds of unsuspecting people outside of the wildy and getting freaking rich

also its not even in real runescape[/quote]
And getting freaking banned…

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:3, topic:21216”]1: MoparScape was coded by one person, not a whole team of fools named “Jagex”.
2: MoparScape has an assload of glitches. Nobody gives a fuck because they are annoying to fix.
3: How the hell did you quote your only post into itself?[/quote]
If I knew, I’d tell you. But I don’t, so I can’t!

Read full topic
